lyric:
Underneath the moonlit sky
Where the stars begin to shine
I'll sing a serenade for you
My love, forever thine

Through the whispers of the wind
And the rustling leaves in the night
I'll croon a melody so sweet
In the pale and silvery light

As we dance among the dreams
In the meadows soft and wide
My heart's serenade will play
As we twirl side by side

With your hand in mine, we'll sway
To the music of the night
Our love's song, a timeless tune
In the soft and gentle moonlight

Chorus:
Serenade of the stars, oh so bright
In your arms, I find my light
In this serenade of love tonight

Through the highs and through the lows
In the journey that we share
I'll sing this serenade for you
With a love beyond compare

Through the stormy nights we face
And the battles that we fight
I'll serenade you through it all
With a love that's burning bright

As we build our dreams so high
And our spirits take their flight
This serenade will be our song
As we reach new heights

With your heart and soul entwined
In this love that feels so right
Together we'll embrace the world
In the serenade of our life

Chorus:
Serenade of the stars, oh so bright
In your arms, I find my light
In this serenade of love tonight

Bridge:
In every moment, in every day
In this serenade, our love will stay
With you, I've found my way
Together, forever, we'll never sway

Chorus:
Serenade of the stars, oh so bright
In your arms, I find my light
In this serenade of love tonight

Outro:
Underneath the moonlit sky
Where the stars begin to shine
I'll sing a serenade for you
My love, forever thine
